channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #ja @ 1456818620705685507
item.description:
ニューヨーク市の過去の犯罪の通報データを用いて、GridDBのGEOMETRY型(空間型) データの実用的な使い方を紹介‼️：https://t.co/gFb3MGZROa
#GridDB #OpenSource #OSS #OpenData #NYC #オープンソース #オープンデータ #駆け出しエンジニアとつながりたい #駆け出しエンジニアと繋がりたい https://t.co/h0SeYzK0a3

item.title: #es @ 1456771365109915649
item.description: #COVID19mx Regresan los errores de captura en el informe técnico diario, pues según los propios datos abiertos de la @SSalud_mx son 284,414 defunciones confirmadas, y no 289,413 ¿no saben ni cómo automatizar un reporte? 🙄 https://t.co/uOkxeHLcFz

item.title: #es @ 1456736614043033605
item.description:
🙏Regiones con CERO fallecidos por #COVID19 durante "N" días consecutivos:
Ucayali: 46 días Pasco: 18 días Amazonas, Loreto: 9 días Cajamarca: 6 días
Fuente #DatosAbiertos 🇵🇪 Hoy 05Nov MINSA reportará 15 fallecidos con respecto a las últimas 24h
#SigamosCuidándonos #Vacunate

item.description: Al no existir #DatosAbiertos de vacunación, estas son las únicas fuentes para actualizar herramientas y notas en nuestro sitio. ¿Cuándo podremos consultar esta información? (2/2)

item.title: #en @ 1456629879009525766
item.description: Massachusetts passed Question 1, requiring manufacturers that sell vehicles with telematics systems to have a standardized open data platform beginning in 2022 models that vehicle owners and independent repair facilities may access to retrieve mechanical data and run diagnostics. https://t.co/wybM6ZWzVU

item.title: #en @ 1456383874020356099
item.description:
@cameron @elonmusk @DrEliDavid “Show us your transaction ledger” is the new “show us your tax returns”
But really, the UN, the WHO, and essentially any organization serving the “world” should have open data and public transaction ledgers for the sake of solving problems and being transparent.

item.title: #en @ 1456381415373815808

item.title: #en @ 1456328690913234945
item.description: Stoked that data archives and data access are prioritized! But no mention of *open* data access, or supporting training in software or computational methods, or supporting the software itself in "foundational activities"...?? #Astro2020

item.title: #en @ 1456298680705818630
item.description:
How much does the lack of open data in traditional finance obfuscate price discovery and create proprietary data driven asymmetric strategies?
If any amount, would completely open and transparent financial systems solve this?
I don't have an answer here.
